com.application.views

Class FileSelectionView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.server.AbstractClientConnector
      • com.vaadin.ui.AbstractComponent
        • com.vaadin.ui.CustomComponent
          • com.application.views.FileSelectionView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.vaadin.event.MethodEventSource, com.vaadin.server.ClientConnector, com.vaadin.server.Sizeable, com.vaadin.shared.Connector, com.vaadin.ui.Component, com.vaadin.ui.HasComponents, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<com.vaadin.ui.Component>

    public class FileSelectionView
extends com.vaadin.ui.CustomComponent
    View to select, download and modify files, TEI schemas and projects.
    Author:
    Miguel Urízar Salinas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • createFileSelectionView

        public void createFileSelectionView()
        Creates the view.

        Includes the barLayout and the panel for file selection

      • buildFileSelectionPanel

        private com.vaadin.ui.HorizontalSplitPanel buildFileSelectionPanel()
                                                            throws org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException
        Creates the panel for selecting the file.

        On the left of the panel there is a layout with the projects as clickable buttons, and on the right panel a layout shows the files in the chosen project. No default project is selected at the beginning

        Returns:
        Panel that contains the projects an files
        Throws:
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException

      • updateProjectsLayout

        public void updateProjectsLayout()
        Updates the projectLayout without changing anything else and activates the project that was active.

      • buildProjectsLayout

        public com.vaadin.ui.VerticalLayout buildProjectsLayout()
                                                 throws org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException
        Layout with the projects as buttons.

        Also fills the file layout with a project or an empty one. When a project is clicked, file layout is changed.

        Returns:
        Layout with the available projects
        Throws:
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException

      • buildFilesLayout

        private com.vaadin.ui.VerticalLayout buildFilesLayout()
                                               throws org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException
        Creates the files layout with a title to modify the project and a table with all the files in the project.
        Returns:
        layout with the files of the selected project or a layout with a label asking to choose a project
        Throws:
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException

      • menuFileSelectionTitle

        private com.vaadin.ui.HorizontalLayout menuFileSelectionTitle()
                                                       throws org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException
        Creates the title for the file layout with the buttons to modify the project.
        Returns:
        Layout with a title with the project name and buttons to edit that layout.
        Throws:
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException

      • menuFileSelectionTable

        private com.vaadin.ui.Table menuFileSelectionTable()
                                            throws org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException
        Creates a table with a row for each file.

        Each row has a name, date modified, size and action buttons. A column is hidden for knowing the path of each file. From css resizing rows is disabled. When clicking a row, text editor is opened for that file.

        Returns:
        Filled table for showing the files from selected project.
        Throws:
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException

      • buildBarLayout

        private com.vaadin.ui.VerticalLayout buildBarLayout()
        Creates a bar for the top of the view displaying menu buttons.
        Returns:
        Layout with the menu buttons

      • deleteProjectButton

        private com.vaadin.ui.Button deleteProjectButton()
        Button to delete the project and all its linked files.

        It first informs the user with a confirm dialog.

        Returns:
        A button that deletes the project when clicking.

      • renameProjectButton

        private com.vaadin.ui.Button renameProjectButton()
        Creates a new button for renaming the project.

        It opens a new tab for renaming it. A project must be selected and sends a warning if the new project name already exists.

        Returns:
        Rename button with the listener for renaming the file

      • selectTEIStructure

        private void selectTEIStructure(java.lang.String selectedProject,
                      boolean mandatory)
        Modal window to select the TEI structure for the project

        It allows also to update a new TEI schema.

        Parameters:
        selectedProject - Project to update the TEI file
        mandatory - if true is mandatory to select a TEI schema

      • updatedFile

        public boolean updatedFile(java.lang.String projectId)
        If the file is inside the active project, the file selection layout is updated. If not, nothing is done
        Parameters:
        projectId - Id of the project where the file belongs to.
        Returns:
        true if content is updated and false if not.
